cpl.readme: * Adds the "Advanced Search" tab also to the right sidebar * Replaces the default search option with an icon * Adds a "+" button to the advanced search function ** Allows to pin existing search settings to a new tab ---- ''Important'': This plugin modifies several core templates <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] $:/AdvancedSearch $:/tags/AdvancedSearch"><$link to=<>><>
